translation: 尸检报告：加里克·皮尔斯

original: "Died at 2:45PM, in the Prayer Room. Cause of death was blood loss. A shard of frozen liquid was found stabbed through his heart. It is very likely that this was the murder weapon. \n \nThe wound also shows heavy traces of transmutation magic. And traces of conjuration magic were found throughout the room.”
translation: “死亡时间下午 2:45，地点为祷告室。死因失血过多。心脏被一片锋利的冰冻液体刺穿，这很可能就是凶器。\n\n伤口上发现了大量形变术魔法的痕迹。屋内也发现了召唤术魔法的痕迹。”
